overview: Sindee's pissed! And who wouldn't be? It seems that she fell for a certain Mobster who suddenly disappeared. Now he's back, as an undercover cop, ready to bust everything wide open including her! So standby for some serious anal action, a 3-way and a red hot girl/girl scene between Sindee and Jenna Jameson!
tagline: Ever wonder how it feels to be stabbed in the back? Sindee Coxxx does...
title: Betrayed
